page.title: 04 Bilton Families' Lifestyles
page.content: 106 families of children of Thanet Junior School supplied data for a social survey of{Bilton.} 75% of families live in private, semi-detached{houses}each with a garage, garden and central-heating. 23 families did not own a car, 70 families had one car, and 13 were 2 - car families. This may be expected as there is little employment within {Bilton}itself and people will need to travel to work. To help with{housework 89 families have an automatic washing machine, 52 families have tumbledriers and 24 families have micro-wave ovens. 81 families own a freezer.The majority of families have a refrigerator and a telephone and 105 families share 214 televisions.Some of the T.V.'s may be used in conjunction with the 72 {computers}owned by the families or with the 63 video recorders.
